parameters.name: accessKey
parameters.description: The AccessKey ID of the MaxCompute data source.

parameters.name: accessSecret
parameters.description: The AccessKey secret of the MaxCompute data source.

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: The endpoint of the MaxCompute data source.

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The namespace of the SARO data source.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The name of the MaxCompute project that is used as the data source.

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: The name of the MaxCompute table that is used as the data source.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the data source. Valid values: odps, swift, saro, oss, and unKnow.
